description: Sedge (Carex comans 'Frosted Curls') is an amazing ornamental grass that looks like a living fountain. Its long, thin leaves are striped with white, giving them a translucent, frosted appearance. This eye-catching grass dances gracefully in the breeze and is a great choice for adding texture and movement to a garden. It tolerates full sun and partial shade but prefers moist soils and humid climates. Its low-maintenance characteristics make it the perfect addition to any garden or landscape.
